pullrequest.title: Deprecate LoadLibrary change it by LoadLib

content.raw:
This warning tells me that this function is not recommended for use on version 0, and will be removed on version 1. But this branch is version 1. So should it be `IGN_DEPRECATED(1.0)` instead?

Another thought is whether we do need to deprecate it, I'm not sure how many people are using this library, has it ever been released beyond pre-release? If not, we could just change the function without tick-tocking.

I'm also a bit confused with the branches on this repository, I see there's `ign-plugin0`, `ign-plugin1` and `default` - should default be version 2? And what's the branch we should be using for Ignition Acropolis?

Sorry for all the questions into one comment.
